Question: Burton (2008) argues that this person's republicanism was taken up by the Freedmen as they were emancipated.
Hints: Each time a general failed, this person substituted another until finally Grant succeeded in 1865.
A wedding set for January 1, 1841, was canceled when the two broke off their engagement at this person's initiative.
Meanwhile, this person and nearly every Republican leader agreed that the dismantling of the Union could not be tolerated.
